text: You can choose how you want to display the Legacy Desktop, and you can start the Legacy Desktop for multiple instances of the Platform via the Desktop Launcher application, or you can start it in your browser. Refer to the relevant section for how to install and configure the Legacy Desktop for each of these options. This chapter includes the following sections: Desktop Launcher
